showerReviews.reviewText: Beautiful  space for celebrating special occasions. We were there for a baby shower itbwas fabulous

My friends and I booked the gathering house for a baby shower. We thought the price was great, and the venue is super cute and great size for a small event. The first red flag of many is that they do not allow you to tour the facility and …

… Outdoor chairs,tables, arch's. These things are a lot to add onto a day. Over all if you want things to be stress free I would not suggest this place. I think it would be ok for a bridal shower or birthday

… either of them no matter how far in advance you try. Nature trail, open areas for group activities, & a fairly good amount of parking make this a nice place to spend a sunny afternoon with the kiddos or host a scouting event or baby shower.
This was a lovely park.  The grounds looked nice and we'll kept. The gathering house was a perfect spot for a baby shower!!

… everyone just uses the pool. I smelled like urine and baby poop when I left. You might want to bring some high heeled shower shoes and rinse off before you leave. Pool is run by young kids with varying degrees of interest in their jobs.

… ! No Christlike character here! I told them that I am homeless so that I could get a free membership and shower here, and the person who answered the phone blew me off! I guess I am forced to pay for a gym membership elsewhere! Thanks …
A nice park. Has some stone animals which my daughter loved. It was nice and quiet and clean. Had a few walking trails which were very nice. …

Back in May '23 we had my dad's Celebration of Life here. The place is nice, plenty of parking, restrooms, fridge,  ample seating and nice atmosphere. It was what we expected via photos on their site and the price was a great deal …

I walk at this park at least once q week because it's close to my house and always so lovely. It's a small park, but it's easy to stretch things out or go around more than once on nicely paved trails. Everything is always clean and the …
This venue made for a beautiful wedding event center! Lighting was perfect and it was a stunning event. Parking was easy. Bathrooms were clean.

showerReviews.reviewText: Tons of parking, showers. You shower the size of closet, but clean a good deal
David McleanLocal Guide · 836 reviews · 963 photos

… gas. Bathroom were clean to my surprise and employees friendly. Back up heading north next night stop over 6am shower, walk to shower we walked on wet dirty towels to get to our showers! They were just thrown out in the hallway! Wasn't the …
Showers were disgusting balls of hair still on the floor hair on the shower wall stuff still on the sink truly unacceptable the employee cleaning them should be fired it's 2149 on 08/24/25

The works are rude all but the guy that is cleaning the shower he was nice and understood that the shower was so gross when I walk in there I had to clean is up my self before taking a shower and I say the works are rude because I let one …

Came here for a shower, laundry and gas. The gas across the street is 10¢ cheaper. The shower is hot, but a little bit on the not so clean side. I washed my clothes in the shower to try and save on time and money. The washers $2.75 and …

Truck parking is a little tight but the lot is clean. Shower rooms are on the small side but clean and there are plenty of them. Didn’t use the laundry or lounge but they looked clean and comfortable.
Talked a shower wash cloths eat at Denny's this place has it all not to mention getting gas and other Delectables select treats and drinks
Plenty of parking and well setup. Always able to get a shower here without having to wait. Staff was friendly and professional. Ate at the Denny's and the food was good and the service was not bad.
So un called for... I just entered to shower in #7 and noticed before I sat to take care of business... ridiculous 12-4-22 4:38pm

Came in at 1am.. Shower was very clean and the water was very hot, good water pressure. Good place to shower. The denny's was open as advertised (Sometimes they say 24hrs on google but then closed when you arrive late). Server was great. No …

Better bring soap, cause my shower had nothing but empty dispensers and big chunks of brown crud on the floor and in the shower.  They tend to run out of x-large cups and not restock until you ask for one. You'll be waiting 5-10 minutes on …

I often come here because of my route. The showers are always dirty, and moldy and it seems like they don't clean the toilets after the shower is used. There is always a mess and the towels look like they are rarely cleaned. I end up using …
One of the worst,  no holding of reserve parking,just show up and park anywhere doesn't even have to be a parking spot. Waited over 2 hours for a shower with 2 people ahead. Employees were on break

This place is filthy. Of course, I needed a shower; but if you can't keep the general bathroom clean I will not step into a shower. I was there for 12 hrs and not one time was that bathroom cleaned since one of the hand drying dispensers …

Visited pilot store 438 on 3/22 for a shower. Even though the cost of showers has recently risen I have to give these guys their props.  The entire shower area was very clean, the floor, the toilet, the sink, all of it. I will definitely …

The people who work there are nice an professional but who ever cleans the showers needs to be talked to. my first day in the shower no toilet paper an the shower would not drain properly.the second time I used the shower u could clearly …

Wanted a good hot shower and wouldn't you know it I haven't been on the road past couple weeks and didn't pack a bar of soap. No biggie right? I mean, every pilot I've showered in had liquid soap in shower but I never needed it. …

This place needs a massive change in employees working night shift who can keep up with shower cleanings and laundry. Waited over 45 minutes as the next in line while 6 showers remained open, uncleaned and without towels. When I asked what …
… For truckers, RV owners and anyone traveling looking for a shower, Pilot on exit 6 or Flying J at exit 2 are the best to get clean. …

I normally stop here on my commute because I frequent this route!! Shower app doesn't work to check-in,nobody likes to clean apparently and I guess if u buy a whole bunch of merchandise they don't offer to ask If u need a bag!! This place …
Gotta be the cleanest showers I've ever used at ANY Pilot/Flying J/One9 in the 7 years I've been on the road. …

went into a “shower room” and it was the cleanest public restroom I have EVER been in! the towels were folded so neatly, there were mints and a water bottle. The shower looked as clean and inviting as could be!! …

… staff I have ever meet the store manager I think is what he was but the nicest I have ever meet.. went out of his way to see if we needed anything helped us with shower and all.. please go check this pilot out it would be worth your time .
A nice amount of parking and the staff was pretty friendly.  The bathrooms and shower were clean and fresh
Been driving all night wanted to take a hot shower the water was cold the shower curtain was nasty if I can give this pilot  0 stars I would have
Nice place hot shower nd eat subway good tho
Shower clean hot good pressure
Excellent shower. Customer service excellence as well
Waited for shower 1 hour

showerReviews.reviewText: … the pumps even the card readers said Pilot. I asked if I’m able to use my pilot card. He said yes. I said even for a shower. He replied with “I already said you could use it.” After my shower I got food. I went to claim an offer for a free …

… pilot to visit. The bathrooms are clean. The inside of the store and parking lot are clean. They have a kitchen where you can order food. Unfortunately mobile codes don’t work for fuel. You can’t get shower codes on your phone as well.
This is not a pilot here from pilot, only a gas station, you won’t be able to take a shower here according to your rewards.
… The separate shower and laundry area away from public restrooms is nice also and I am sure the OTR drivers appreciate it.
The showers have a creepy Norman Bates, feel! Whoever designed these showers should’ve been fired. …

… HOWEVER  if you are looking for a great shower experience then DO NOT come here.  I arrived checked in for prime parking  the evening crew made me feel like I was bothering them.  So rather discuss the matter I went back to my truck and …

Great customer service, if there's any kind of line their opening up another register for fast service! Plus everyone I talked to was super helpful and friendly. Great shower. Easy parking. Lots of cool things to buy! Great truckstop all …
Great service, good prices.  Wife is in wheel chair and needs assistance, was allowed to use truckers shower.  Very helpful.   Would recommend any Pilot station for your needs.
stopped in long enough to shower. 1.5hr & still had to pay the 18$ for paid parking. what happened to the first 2hrs free?
